welcome_message_body: Welcome to Butzbach, Germany! Experience the charm of this picturesque city and discover its rich history and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Butzbach has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, currently under construction and set to open in 2023.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 30 minutes per device. Premium options are available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
